title: University of Newcastle Team
body:
Hey guys,

Just interested in putting together a Newcastle Uni team if anyone on the forums is from around here.

I'm an ADC main, but I play all roles so I'm easy. 
Currently Diamond 5 too

Cheers guys :D

replies.body: Probably a bit late, but if you haven't found another player I may be interested in joining.
We could always use another sub man, we did end up finding some people but if you would like fill in for a sub you could! will need a speedy reply tho as the deadline is in 1 hour.
If you've already got a couple of people then I'll pass. Just didn't want to see a team not able to enter because they couldn't find one more person. Thanks and good luck.
Looking for one more, probs a jungler at this moment, altho we'd be happy to take more than one person so we can have a sub or two :D

Hey mate,

I'm starting at UON this semester, is there much of a LoL community at Callaghan? 
I play top in my ranked 5s team and Shaco in all roles in Normals..... and not very well....  YOLO.
Let me know when you're playing/streaming and i will have a brew in your honour and yell at the pretty colours!!

Modbrat
So after messaging around a bit, there does seem to be a small community on FB at the very least. would you be interested in joining a team man?

I actually have no idea my self, hence the point. 

Oko/Jon above tho seems to know more. Sadly i  cannot stream without NBN but my youtubes is found here :D 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjyf6WBW5xfrfXoZY4m5fGg

Hi Bonebreaker,
I'm Jon, the Video Games Coordinator for the Newcastle University Anime Club. We ran the qualifiers for UoN for the Semester 1 competition. I'd be happy to put you in touch with other players from UoN who are looking for teams. You can also check out our announcements over on our Facebook page or send us an email at nuac.contact@gmail.com if you like. If you have any questions let us know.

Yea sure man that would be awesome, i'd deffo be keen in finding people who are looking for a new team member :D

Should I email you or should i message you on the anime club FB page??
